heading: About
text1: My name is Alexandra Slaboshpitskaya, I live and work in Odessa, Ukraine. Psychologist, artist, member of the youth section of the Artists' Union of Ukraine (entry date 2015), repeated participant of All-Ukrainian (2015-2017) and regional (2015-2018) art exhibitions, constantly conducting personal exhibitions (2014-2018), student of the famous stained-glass window artist Vyacheslav Rode.
